oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abdullah frères, photographer.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Harbors--Turkey--Istanbul--1880-1900.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Title translated from album caption.
Captioned in Ottoman Turkish and French.
Minaret of the Arap Camii (Mosque of the Arabs) (left front). Smokestacks of a yeast factory (center, across the Golden Horn). (Source: researcher H. Yenigün, 2005).
In album: Hasköy Hospital for Women, fountains, mausoleums, and other buildings and views, Istanbul, Ottoman Empire.
Forms part of: Abdul-Hamid II Collection (Library of Congress).
